dict.acceptation: 难看的；丑陋的；有敌意的；不祥的；

sent.orig: Ugly Naked Guy's having Thanksgiving dinner with Ugly Naked Girl.
sent.trans: 他正和一个丑陋裸女共进感恩节晚餐。

sent.orig: Once there was an ugly barnacle. He was so ugly that everyone died. The end.
sent.trans: 从前有一只很丑的企鹅他丑得把所有人都丑死了。

sent.orig: It's an unattractive building, even ugly/ugly even.
sent.trans: 这座建物很不起眼，甚至可以说很难看。

sent.orig: So everybody condemned the stone: an ugly stone as ugly as it could be.
sent.trans: 人都骂它是丑石，它真是丑得不能再丑的丑石了。

sent.orig: "All right, since you say he's ugly, then call him Ah Ch'ou (Ugly Boy)."
sent.trans: “好，你说他长得丑，就叫他‘丑儿’得了。”
